title: Honor Capsule
body:
Hello, I reached Honor 4 a couple days ago and I still haven't had any capsule. Is this normal or do I just have a really bad luck ?
Thanks for answers.

Reishin.

replies.body: [**Honor capsules**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148) aren't a guaranteed drop at any certain Honor rank, but they have a chance of dropping anytime you would have gotten a key. If you've already reached your key limit for the month, you won't be able to get honor capsules.
